0 Param data.1 string m_text:
A soft rain fell the day my parents died.

An illness claimed them in the end.

The adults told me I mustn't grieve. They spoke only of their memories of my parents, and their expectations for the afterlife.
Don't be sad, Kagachi.
I'll go talk to my daddy.
He's a Watcher. He can talk to dead people.
Maybe he can talk to your mommy and daddy, too.
No, don't. I'm okay.
Who's there?
It's you...
Huh? Who?
But...why aren't you whole?
Whole...what?
What are you talking about?
Are you okay?
That girl knows me.
What girl?
She was justâ€”uh...
Help him, Daddy.
Come, Kagachi.
Now, this is goodbye for your mom and dad.
But you mustn't grieve for them.
Why not?
Why can't I be sad?
Grief fills the dead with regret, my boy.
When the dead carry regret they lose their way, and those who are lost cannot be reborn.
They can't?
No, son, they can't.
Those who are lost lose their souls, and cannot be reborn as people.
Reincarnation is the way of our land. To be lost is to go against the natural order.
Do you understand?
Yeah... I think so.
Good.
Then there is still a path for you.

Twenty Years Later

I wouldn't understand the meaning of those words for many years.

Not until I joined the Veil Watch, just like Mayura's father.

The Watchers maintain order between the Living World and the Beyond.

We travel between worlds, rescuing the Lost who have wandered from the path.
We'll use our Daemons to do battle here.
Ready?
Ready.
You take the ones over there.
I see you've taken care of things here.
Thank you. Well done.
Why are you so nice to them? They're just another weapon.
Watch what you say!
Daemons used to be people. People with feelings.
Yeah, "used to be."
Fine, have it your way. Let's just finish the mission.
It looks like the Lost Soul we seek is a little boy. Did Leo fill you in on his story?
I hope he's ready to hear what we have to say.
I'll handle it.
If I've said it once I've said it a million times: you really need to change your attitude.
The feelings of the living make the dead lose their way. Or have you forgotten?
The Lost are already lost.
You are just impossible! Come on, let's go!
See you there!
So you're the little boy.
Who are you?
We're Watchers. We've come to send you off.
Send me off?
Am...am I dead?
I'm afraid so.
We're here to help you pass into the next world.
Do you have anything you want to tell us? Anything you're sad or upset about that might be keeping you here?
I'm worried about my mom and dad...
I don't want them to get lonely without me.
No point worrying over it.
That's not your problem.
No point worrying over it. You can't do anything about that while you're dead.
If it upsets you that much, work on getting reincarnated, and fix it in the Living World.
I guess you're right. I'm the one who died. It's my fault...
That's not what we're saying. This isn't about blame.
Think before you speak, Kagachi!
That's not your problem.
Let the living worry about their own lives.
Maybe you're right... I can't do anything about it, anyway. I'm dead now.
But that doesn't make you helpless. You can be reincarnated and return to the Living World.
What?
Nothing.
Okay. But before I go...
I want to see my mom and dad one more time. Is that okay?
Just once. Please.
Please?
What should we do?
Sure, let him see them.
What do you want to do?
Sure, let him see them.
All right.
What do you want to do?
I think we should let him have this.
All right then.
Okay, listen.
We'll take you to see them.
You really mean it!?
But in return, this has to be goodbye. Are you ready for that?
Yeah! I promise!
Where should we go? To your house?
Yeah! They're probably at home. My house is this way!
Then let's go.
Let's pass through the Veil.
Great job, both of you. You've formed a bond with these souls.
What are these, Dad?
They're souls who could not be reincarnated, damned, or banished.
They have no memory of their past life, but they can bond to us, and they're good at taking orders.
We call them Daemons. They're technically a special type of the Lost.
Wow...
Isn't there some way to help them remember their past life?
Not that I've heard of.
That's so sad...
Don't worry. I'll find a way to restore your memories.
A perfect chance to try out this new Daemon.
Here's my house!
But...
What's the matter?
I can't go back to their world, can I?
That's why we're here. Just stay close to me, okay?
You can cross over into the Living World for a bit if you stand near a Watcher.
Are you serious!?
Okay, we're ready. Let's go, Kagachi.
Greetings. We're Watchers, and we have something to tell you.
Something about your son.
We're sorry to bring such a sensitive subject up without warning...
...but we need you to keep praying that he'll journey safely into the next life.
You needn't worry about that. We've been praying ever since he passed.
We hope his next life will be a happy one.
We aren't grieving, though. We wouldn't want him to lose his way.
We want our happiness to be his guide.
Let's hope so.
Has something happened?
Surely he's already crossed over by now?
I'm sorry to say he hasn't.
In fact, he's right here by our side.
But how? What happened!?
Mom... Dad...
I want to go home... Let me come home!
Don't cry. Stay strong.
He's crying? Why is he crying?
I'm all alone. I don't want to be alone anymore!
He says he doesn't want to be alone.
You're not telling us everything.
He says he doesn't want to be alone.
Kagachi, no!
Whatever you're hiding from him is holding him back.
You're not telling us everything.
We're not?
Whatever feelings you've got buried inside are causing your child pain.
So you'd better get them out.
Kagachi, stop it!
But weâ€”!
Honey, please.
Forgive me.
I... I can't just leave our little boy all alone.
This was a mistake.
You know we can't bring him back.
I do...
Then you understand that you must go to him if you want to see him again.
I understand. I'm ready.
Hngh... *sniff*
So that's how it is...
I guess it was always meant to be this way.
I'll go, too. I can't bear to leave him.
I just can't...
So you've made up your mind?
We'll get to see him, won't we?
I make no promises.
Hmmm... Very well.
I'm ready. Do as you will...
As long as this puts his soul at ease, I am satisfied.
Understood. Leave the rest to us.
Thank you.
We're on our way, son.
Any objections?
None.
I'll do it.
You take care of it.
I'll do it.
Just hold still.

You mustn't grieve. Grief fills the dead with regret.

When the dead carry regret they lose their way, and those who are lost cannot be reborn.

And so, we Watchers pray for reincarnation as we carry out our duties.

For that is the way of this land.
You take care of it.
Okay...
My grandma's really sick...
We can't stand to watch her suffer...
We're thinking of applying for, you know...the tithing.
Ending her suffering early, you mean?
Yeah.
We've heard they give you a little bit of money for it, since it helps the reincarnation.
Well in that case it might be the best thing to do.
I want you to have this.
Oh my gosh! What is it?
A charm.
It's the latest thing. It'll help us meet again in the next world!
Oh... Thanks. That's...really sweet of you.
You're, uh, welcome. I'm... I'm glad you like it.
Say, have you caught that murdering creature yet? The Night Something-or-Other?
Oh, the Night Devil? Pfft, don't worry about the likes of that.
Us Watchers'll get it soon enough, you'll see!
Is it true that you can't pass Beyond the Veil if the Night Devil kills you?
Eh, who cares?
Listen to me! This is serious!
Join the Ark of Hope and guarantee your passage into the afterlife! It's the only way to ensure you'll be reincarnated with your friends and family!
The Ark of Hope can save you!
Join us for a meeting!
Yes, join us!
Did ya hear the latest, Kagachi?
The Night Devil bagged another one!
Quit talking like that.
It must really like killin'.
I said quit it!
C'mon, knock it off. You wouldn't like 'em when they're angry.
Oh nooo! Not death talk! Anything but death talk!
You want me to send you both off for good?
We were just joking! It was all a joke!
Sweet souls, you are terrifying!
Come on. We're outta here.
Idiots! They don't have an ounce of the willpower you do, Kagachi!
I'm over it.
Don't worry about taking them on.
We know you've had to make tough choices.
You're good people. Everyone knows it.
They're hopeless anyway.
You two should go get some rest. You've earned it.
Kiro Marsh is really nice. Deep in the heart of it there's an area just bursting with gorgeous flowers.
Hey, what're you doing? I thought that was our secret spot!
Oh, stop it. There's no harm in telling them!
You heard nothing. Got that?
Don't be stupid, Jigari.
Look out for Kagachi, okay?
And come find me at the first sign of any trouble.
Thank you so much. I love you guys.
Hehe, back at you.
We'll see you later!
Okay, I'm gonna head off too. We should get some rest.
Come with me, all of you! Those fools in the Ark of Hope have lost their minds!
What've they done now?
Their disciples have taken their own lives without authorization!
Who was among them?
I don't have names.
There are thirty dead already.
What.
We had Watchers keeping an eye on them and everything. I can't believe this is happening!
We have to hurry.
Kagachi, I want you to check the area and see if any of the dead have become Lost.
Make your way to the northern plaza in the ruins.
Hitoha and Jigari, you talk to the disciples down below and figure out what's going on.
Understood. Let's go, Jigari!
Moving out.
I want the rest of you to secure the area. Kujo, you're in command.
I have to report to Leo.
Are you one of the disciples?
Yeah... Where is everybody?
You're the only one I've found. I think the others have already crossed over.
Oh...
Anyone with unfinished businessâ€”like youâ€”was left behind. So tell me what's on your mind.
Right...
That makes sense.
What does?
Well, I was nervous because he wasn't here.
Who wasn't here?
The Navigator.
He said he would be here to lead us, but I didn't see him...
Maybe he crossed over with the others.
Yeah...maybe.
You don't sound convinced.
It's just a feeling, but there was something strange about the way he acted...
Strange how?
Sometimes he would hide away in the altar room by himself. But when I peeked in, he wasn't there.
And then, all of a sudden, he'd come walking right out, as if nothing had happened.
So why all the sneaking around, unless he had something to hide?
Wait, forget I said that! The Navigator wouldn't hide anything from us! I know he wouldn't!
Why deny it now?
There's no need to hide your doubts.
You think there's a reason you haven't seen him since you died.
Yeah...
Good. Now it falls to me to end your doubts.
Where is the Quay?
It's west of here.
You think the Navigator's there?
If he's not, that means he crossed over ahead of you. And you'll need to accept that.
Okay.
Would it be all right if I went with you? I'd like to see the Navigator.
That's the idea. It's the only way you'll understand.
Come on.
Are you the one they call the Navigator?
Y-Yes, I am. Why do you ask?
No games. You know why I'm here.
D-Do I?
You just killed a bunch of your followers.
Th-That was something they did of their own accord!
I said no games. I brought a witness.
A w-witness, you say?
A child. He's waiting for you. You said you'd join him Beyond the Veil.
Ah...him.
So you know him.
Your move, then.
If you want to keep your promise, I can send you off right here and now.
A-As if you had the right to do such a thing!
I do. I'm a Watcher.
I hold the laws of reincarnation above all else.
Wait, wait, wait!
Please grant me the mercy of life! Please, I beg of you!
It sounds like your Navigator never intended to join you.
It does...doesn't it.
That must be quite the surprise. Do you see now?
Yeah. I guess some part of me secretly doubted his words all along...
I...I feel pretty stupid. *chuckle*
There's always the next life.
Thank you...I think. It's strange to hear someone say that to me out loud.
I'm ready to go now.
I think I can still catch up to the others. I hope I'll get to see you again, once I'm reincarnated.
That's a lovely thought, but there are no guarantees.
You didn't say it WON'T happen. There's a chance, right?
You've got me there.
Then I'll hope for the best.
Farewell.
Come with me. You can tell your side of the story at the trial.
I got your message. I assume this is the Ark of Hope's "Navigator."
Everything is in order for the trial. We should make our way to the courtroom at once!
It's her...
The girl who came to me when I was young.
She hasn't aged a day.
He's all yours, Kushi. I need to take care of something.
What could you possiblyâ€”!? Hey! Get back here!
Where'd you go?
You look so peaceful.
I'm glad you passed without pain.
I'll keep on keeping on, so I can tell you some stories about the future you didn't get to see.
And once I've got enough of them...
...well, then I'll come join you.
I love you. I've always loved you.
It's like my parents passing all over again.
What did you do to them?
I was just praying for them...
It's all I can do.
What are you?
I am the one who sealed him away.
And now...
He's hunting me. He wants me gone.
He wants to...unleash his hatred.
You...
Could it be...?
I don't believe it!
Hey, you can't go yet!
Don't fade on me!
What the heck is this?
You're warm...
I can feel your power flowing through me.
Why is that?
I could ask you the same.
One thing's for sure: I owe you my life.
What was that thing?
A spirit of the past...the embodiment of hatred known as the Night Devil.
Perhaps I have prevented him from running amok, and that is why he wishes to erase me.
Why do you say "perhaps"?
Because I can't recall for sure...
When I awoke as a Daemon, the only desire I had was to pursue the Night Devil.
My power, however, is limited...
What happens if he succeeds?
His hatred will be unleashed, and I fear it will reach even into the Living World.
Then we have to stop him.
I would prefer to save him.
Save him? How?
I want to ease the hurt that fuels his hate, and send him Beyond the Veil.
You'll need more than prayer for that. He doesn't seem like a good listener.
We have to stick together.
What?
Having you by my side gives us both an advantage.
For one, you won't get erased. Though I'm not sure why.
For another, the Night Devil is going to come after you.
As a Watcher, I can't let him threaten the Living World.
So I'll use you to lure him out.
And then... Well, I'll figure out what to do with him once we find him.
Very well. That is acceptable for now.
Then we have a deal.
What's your name?
Do you even have a name?
I don't know.
Forgot that too, huh?
Well...
How about Linne?
Sorry?
Your necklace is a linnaea flower, isn't it?
Oh, yes! You're right.
Then it's settled. Come on, let's get back to the Living World.
What the hell were you thinking, leaving the Navigator unattended!?
I wasn't.
Clearly not!
I don't have time for your games, Kagachi. The trial's underway, and they're waiting for your testimony.
So get your ass back to the plaza!
What's with you?
I get tired of my human form. Would you rather I stay human?
What do I care?
Meanie.
Don't start with me. I'm not here to babysit you.
Oh hey, didn't you have somewhere to be?
Iâ€”Oh yeah, the trial. Let's head to the plaza.
Watcher Kagachi, step forward.
Regarding the mass suicide of twenty-nine disciples of the Ark of Hope...
Was it you who apprehended the Navigator?
It was.
And can you provide evidence to support your charge that it was he who gave the order?
I met a boy Beyond the Veil who took part in the suicide.
He told me that the Navigator promised his disciples they'd meet Beyond the Veil. That he would lead them there.
But that was a lie. As you can see, he is still in this world. He never had any intention of taking his own life.
I-I couldn't bring myself to do it!
It was horrifying!
Care to elaborate?
No one knows what happens after we die!
I gazed into the unknown and panicked... So I clung to life instead!
You used those people for your own gain!
And in return they received eternal happiness! I defy you to find fault with that!
Leading those souls astrayâ€”knowing full well you couldn't deliver what you promisedâ€”makes you nothing more than a murderer.
I didn't force them to do it!
I have done no wrong! The real problem lies in the unknown nature of reincarnation!
Forgive the intrusion, but I cannot let that lie.
L-Lady Lobelia!
Pray tell, which part of the law of reincarnation is unclear to you?
Answer her.
B-Butâ€”!
ANSWER HER!
Okay! Okay...
We all come into this world without...er, free of... That is to say, we are born pure.
We have no memory of our past lives, nor our relation to one another.
W-We know neither anger nor sadness.
Which is to say, we are reborn as completely new entities, and so...
Go on.
And so for the living, what comfort is there to be gained from the laws of reincarnation? Are we to face the unknown, knowing we surrender ourselves?
It is th-that mystery upon which I attempted t-to shed some light.
I thought that perhaps the thought of traveling Beyond the Veil with one's soul and memories intact might bring them safety and comfort...
A fine defense. If only you hadn't exploited them.
You feared death enough to choose leaving the dead adrift and letting their souls vanish, and you dare speak of making connections in the afterlife!
When a soul vanishes, its connection to this life is severed entirely.
As sovereign, I have a duty to protect this realm from harm.
And you, the living, bound as you are to life, have a duty to celebrate all creation.
To reject the law of this land, lead the souls of others astray, or selfishly cling to your own life is an offense of the highest order.
You have brought harm upon our people.
You cannot beâ€”!
Silence!
You understand the severity of your crimes, I'm sure. You shall not, however, face execution.
Rather, you shall live out the rest of your days imprisoned.
No... Noooooo!
I'm glad I gave that boy the closure he needed. I wouldn't want him to see you sniveling like this.
Please... Please, just tell me one thing.
I hear there is an ark in our land that CAN connect to the afterlife.
Is it true?
You have heard a lie. No such vessel exists.
I guess he was a true believer after all.
Where are they taking him?
To the dungeons.
In the eyes of the realm, reincarnation is sacred and death must be willing.
Criminals are not worthy of its release.
I see...
What is our world coming to?
It's one thing to believe in the Beyond, but anyone pinning their hopes on it is a damn fool.
If the realm is to see the cycle of reincarnation continue, it cannot abide those who would look to the Beyond for salvation.
